PLAY.TITLE: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra

FM.P: Text placed in the public domain by Moby Lexical Tools, 1992.
This work may be freely copied and distributed worldwide.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLEOPATRA
SPEECH.LINE: If it be love indeed, tell me how much.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARK ANTONY
SPEECH.LINE: There's beggary in the love that can be reckon'd.
